label: 貫
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: A unit of weight measurement(3.75 kilograms or 8.72 pounds); as a unit of value for copper coins, one kan(or kanmon)consisted of one thousand mon; as a unit of value for silver coins, one kan(or kanme)consisted of one thousand monme. [貫文、貫目、匁]
